title: 直播summon一个玩家
author: lrf8643
txt_content:
设置什么的都已经搞好了。一个钻石甲（半神装）



那这就是指令了。手动写我估计没个5分钟码不出来。


/summon minecraft:player ~ ~1 ~ {ArmorItems:[0:{},1:{},2:{id:minecraft:diamond_chestplate,Count:1b,Damage:0s,tag:{ench:[{id:0s,lvl:5s},{id:7s,lvl:1s},{id:70s,lvl:2s}]}}],ArmorDropChances:[0:0.085F,1:0.085F,2:1F,3:0.085F],HandDropChances:[0:0.085F,1:0.085F],CustomName:"我是你大爷",CustomNameVisible:1,Tags:["233"]}复制代码
这必然是无法召唤的。我只是好奇，试试而已0.0




好吧，我还是召唤一个卫道士玩玩。

/summon minecraft:vindication_illager ~ ~1 ~ {ArmorItems:[0:{},1:{},2:{id:minecraft:diamond_chestplate,Count:1b,Damage:0s,tag:{ench:[{id:0s,lvl:5s},{id:7s,lvl:1s},{id:70s,lvl:2s}]}}],HandItems:[0:{},1:{id:minecraft:wooden_sword,Count:1b,Damage:0s,tag:{ench:[{id:16s,lvl:2s},{id:20s,lvl:1s},{id:70s,lvl:1s}],display:{Name:"卫道士的桃木剑",Lore:[0:"66666啊",]},AttributeModifiers:[{Operation:1,UUIDLeast:1224356075,UUIDMost:1224356075,Amount:15,AttributeName:generic.attackSpeed,Name:AttackSpeed}]}}],ArmorDropChances:[0:0.085F,1:0.085F,2:1F,3:0.085F],HandDropChances:[0:0.085F,1:0.085F],CustomName:"我是你大爷",CustomNameVisible:1,Glowing:1b,Tags:["233"]}[/size][size=4]复制代码



这。。。极限作死！！

replies.author: ruhuasiyu
replies.txt_content: 连衣服都不穿就上去干能不死么。。。

replies.txt_content:

replies.txt_content:
